oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Ministry’s major responsibilities related to employment are: developing and delivering policies, programs and services to promote labour force development; helping Albertans train for, find and keep employment; providing financial and health benefits, child support services and employment training support to Albertans in need; ensuring Alberta’s workplaces are safe, healthy, fair, and productive for employees and employers; providing leadership for interprovincial labour mobility policy for the Government of Alberta.
